alert.note: Alert for Grant (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 5:21PM CDT until June 14 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN GRANT...NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON...SOUTHEASTERN SALINE AND SOUTHEASTERN PULASKI COUNTIES... At 520 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tull, or 9 miles southeast of Benton, moving east at 30 mph. This storm has a history of producing up to significantly sized and destructive hail, most recently in Lonsdale and areas of Haskell. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Benton... Sheridan... White Hall... Wrightsville... Redfield... Tull... Cane Creek... Pine Bluff Arsenal... Estes... East End... Orion... Hensley Island... Bauxite... Belfast... Shaw... Lock and Dam 5 Park... Kearney... Tar Camp Park... Woodson... Center Grove... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
